Rasqal
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Rasqal installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Rasqal, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Rasqal/0.9.33-GCCcore-12.3.0
```
